__e: But look at your life through someone else's eyes... and you'll know you have a lot!
At least this way you'll know that... You did the one thing you could.
At least this way you'll know that... You did the one thing you could.
Then you will know, and you will know, and you will know, and you will know, that what I tell you is true.
Because if you are my friend, then you will know that I'm telling you the truth.
She said your answer's there, and you'll know it when you see it
I don't know exactly what you're looking for, but I have a feeling you'll know it when you see it.
I'm sure you'll know it when you see it.
Well, then you'll know all about it, and, oh, what a terrible country it is.
By the time you're old enough to make sense of this life, you'll know everything about me-- the things I'm proud of and the things I regret-- and then you'll be faced with your own decisions.
If I give you my name and number, you'll know everything.
You can kill her if you like, but then you'll never know the truth.
People like you, you think you're so smart that you know what's inside me, you don't know and you never will.
I know more about what you do, and you no need to ask how or why ... just looking, you know, than you will ever know about me.
And he said, See I told you you were perfect.
Well, it's not like you won't know where I am.
The people we both work for don't know my name, and neither will you.
Why, you'll be making so much money, you won't know what to do with it.
You won't know who she is. Just another passing face on your way to the grave.
There is something else, you may know it later
